sentences.en: For those of you who are interested in developing your writing skills, we have a six-week course which runs for two hours between 4 and 6 on Wednesday afternoons beginning in week one.
sentences.cn: 对于那些有兴趣提高写作技能的人，我们有一个为期六周的课程，从第一周开始，每周三下午4点到6点上课。

sentences.en: After the six-week study, they took another.
sentences.cn: 在六周的研究之后，他们又进行了另一项研究。
